Quest001.name: plant
Quest001.text: Our esteemed congress had a coloquiem.We have hensforth come to the erudite and unequivical conclusion that we have an item to help you {0} but we need {1}

No001.name: plant
No001.text: Unfortunately, your trade items are not favourable to us.

Complete001.name: plant
Complete001.text: Please help yourself to {0} with our complements.
